quotes.quote: Bore: one who has the power of speech but not the capacity for conversation.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: Talking with you is sort of the conversational equivalent of an out of body experience.
quotes.author: Bill Watterson

quotes.quote: Saying what we think gives us a wider conversational range than saying what we know.
quotes.author: Cullen Hightower

quotes.quote: Each person's life is lived as a series of conversations.
quotes.author: Deborah Tannen

quotes.quote: The real art of conversation is not only to say the right thing at the right place but to leave unsaid the wrong thing at the tempting moment.
quotes.author: Dorothy Nevill

quotes.quote: Education begins a gentleman, conversation completes him.
quotes.author: Dr. Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: Few are agreeable in conversation, because each thinks more of what he intends to say than of what others are saying, and listens no more when he himself has a chance to speak.
quotes.author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: To listen closely and reply well is the highest perfection we are able to attain in the art of conversation.
quotes.author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: I often quote myself. It adds spice to my conversation.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Anecdotes and maxims are rich treasures to the man of the world, for he knows how to introduce the former at fit place in conversation.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: One of the best rules in conversation is, never to say a thing which any of the company can reasonably wish had been left unsaid.
quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

quotes.quote: Let us make a special effort to stop communicating with each other, so we can have some conversation.
quotes.author: Judith Martin

quotes.quote: Don't knock the weather. If it didn't change once in a while, nine out of ten people couldn't start a conversation.
quotes.author: Kin Hubbard

quotes.quote: Most conversations are simply monologues delivered in the presence of witnesses.
quotes.author: Margaret Millar

quotes.quote: The character of a man is known from his conversations.
quotes.author: Menander

quotes.quote: Conversation is food for the soul.
quotes.author: Mexican Proverb

quotes.quote: You can discover more about a person in an hour of play than in a year of conversation.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Conversation is an art in which a man has all mankind for his competitors, for it is that which all are practising every day while they live.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: There isn�t much better in this life than finding a way to spend a few hours in conversation with people you respect and love. You have to carve this time out of your life because you aren�t really living without it.
quotes.author: Real Live Preacher

quotes.quote: I don't know how to have casual conversation. You think you're talking about one thing, and either you are and it's incredibly boring, or you're not because it's subtext and you need a decoder ring.
quotes.author: Sir Anthony Hawkins

quotes.quote: Your ignorance, cramps my conversation.
quotes.author: Sydney Smith

quotes.quote: He had occasional flashes of silence, that made his conversation perfectly delightful.
quotes.author: Tom Blair

quotes.quote: Silence is one of the great arts of conversation, as allowed by Cicero himself, who says, 'there is not only an art, but an eloquence in it.' A well bred woman may easily and effectually promote the most useful and elegant conversation without speaking a word. The modes of speech are scarcely more variable than the modes of silence.
quotes.author: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.quote: It's always difficult to make conversation with a drunk, and there's no denying it, the sober are at a disadvantage with him.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Conversation should be pleasant without scurrility, witty without affectation, free without indecency, learned without conceitedness, novel without falsehood.
